snippet.title: Spacewar! -  PDP-1 - One of the First Video Games (MIT 1962)
snippet.description:
Made by Steve Russell on a PDP-1 minicomputer at MIT, Spacewar! is one of the first video games, in fact the first fully interactive video game. It was designed to show off the power of the PDP-1, entertain fellow students, and get the chicks!

Slingshot around to the history of Spacewar!, at The Dot Eaters: http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=spa...

We fill the black hole of information on Space Wars, an arcade version of Spacewar! by Cinematronics:
http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=space-wars-and-cinematronics

http://www.thedoteaters.com Video Game History 101

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
